infeasible_scenarios.reasoning: Requires downloading real YouTube transcripts (yt-dlp/youtube-transcript-api) and Google Drive PDFs (gdown) with real URLs. Network services may be unavailable, rate-limited, or return different content. Cannot guarantee reproducible results within 10-minute timeout.
Step 5 requires multi-turn interactive conversation via AskUserQuestion to resolve ambiguities, validate findings, and capture speaker intent. The eval is one-shot with no user interaction available.

The skill requires launching 5 subagents in parallel per batch. The eval sandbox may not support parallel subagent orchestration, and testing the parallelism itself (vs sequential processing) requires process monitoring not available to the grader.

The skill defines a 6-phase workflow with author approval gates at each phase. The agent must use AskUserQuestion for structured choices and conversational clarification. The eval is one-shot with no interactive capability.

infeasible_scenarios.scenarios: Live slide generation with MCP PPT server
infeasible_scenarios.reasoning: Phase 5 requires the MCP PPT server (add_slide, populate_placeholder, manage_image, etc.) to build the .pptx deck interactively. The MCP PPT server is not available in the eval sandbox.

Phase 6 requires PowerPoint application (AppleScript for PDF export), git operations for shownotes publishing, QR code generation, and potentially custom export scripts. None of these are available in the eval sandbox.
